scripts.clone1: rm -rf abap2xlsx && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/abap2xlsx/abap2xlsx && rm -rf abap2xlsx/.git
scripts.clone2: rm -rf abap2xlsx-demos && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/abap2xlsx/demos abap2xlsx-demos && rm -rf abap2xlsx-demos/.git
scripts.clone3: rm -rf open-abap-core && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/open-abap/open-abap-core && rm -rf open-abap-core/.git
scripts.clone: npm run clone1 && npm run clone2 && npm run clone3
scripts.test: npm run clone && rm -rf input && mkdir input && node abap.mjs && npm run transpile && node examples.mjs && npm run webpack
